org.sd.cluster.job
Class WorkServer

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.job.AbstractJob
      org.sd.cluster.job.WorkServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Clusterable, Message, Job, Publishable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractBatchWorkServer
public abstract class WorkServer
extends AbstractJob

A job for serving work to other jobs across a cluster.

Author:
Spence Koehler

doOperate

protected abstract java.lang.String doOperate(java.lang.String requestString)
Given that this work server is running, generate a response string for the request string representing a unit of work.

buildOutputFilename

protected java.lang.String buildOutputFilename()
Build the output filename for this work server's log.

Extenders may override. Default is to use the work server's class name and jobId through the config's output data path.

preHandleHook

protected final boolean preHandleHook(Context context)
Called by the handle method only if 'canHandle' returns true before registering this job with the job manager. If this hook returns false, this job will NOT be registered with the job manager and the postHandleHook will not be called.

Overrides:
preHandleHook in class AbstractJob
